['wealth', '', '<del>had been the causes of his condemnation rather</del>', '', '<del>than</del>']

['<p-end/><p-start/>"felix had been present at the trial;']

['he had, consequently, hired a vessel to convey him to constantinople,']
['<del>having overcome many difficulties succeeded at length in joining her lover in his retreat </del>']
